events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and want to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund due to mention of refund request and wrong item received.
Assigning customer support agent Emily to handle the refund request related to the incorrect item delivered.
Hello! I’m Emily, I’m here to help you with your refund request for the item you received by mistake.
Could you please provide your order number and pictures of the item you received that was incorrect to proceed with the refund?
Here is the order number: 872345 and attached are the photos showing the item I received, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund within 3-5 business days and provide a prepaid label for you to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for your quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate the prepaid label for returning the wrong product.
The refund request has been successfully processed and the return label emailed to the customer to complete the return shipment.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
We are closing this case as the refund was completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
